hangle: 공작님에게 해 달라고 한 적 없는데요?
first_translate: I never asked you to be my partner.
if it’s not siegren, then it’s me.
second_translate: If it's not Siegren, then there's no one else but me, right?

hangle: 하지만 성인이 되어 보호자와 가는 건 촌스러운 일이잖아요.
first_translate: but it’s embarrassing to go with your guardian once you’re an adult.
second_translate: But going with a guardian as an adult is outdated.

first_translate: what’s wrong with being a little embarrassing?
second_translate: What's wrong with doing something a little old-fashioned?

first_translate: we should greet the host first, right?
second_translate: We should greet the host first, right?

first_translate: even though I don’t want to.
second_translate: I don't really want to, but...

first_translate: oh, right... abel doesn’t get along with the imperial family.
second_translate: oh... abel doesn’t have a good relationship with the imperial family.

hangle: 설마 공작이 여기에 올 줄은 몰랐군요.
first_translate: I didn’t expect you to come, duke abel.
second_translate: I never expected the duke to come here.
Since you took the trouble to invite me,

first_translate: I thought it would be polite to attend.
second_translate: Wouldn't it be the proper thing to accept?

first_translate: who is the lady next to you?
second_translate: Who is the young lady beside you?

first_translate: so you’re the one everyone is talking about.
second_translate: So you're the one everyone's been talking about.

first_translate: I heard you were duke heylon’s adopted daughter.
second_translate: I heard you're the adopted daughter of Duke Heylon.

first_translate: it’s rare to see an adopted father and daughter attend as partners.
second_translate: It's rare for an adopted father and daughter to attend together as partners.

hangle: 아직 제 눈에 차는 상대가 없기에.
first_translate: I haven’t found anyone who meets my standards yet.
second_translate: I haven't found anyone who meets my expectations yet.

hangle: 와, 코앞에서 이런 말을 들으니 부끄러워.
first_translate: wow, it’s embarrassing to hear that right in front of me.
second_translate: Wow, hearing that up close is embarrassing.

first_translate: you must care for your adopted daughter a lot.
second_translate: You must be very fond of your adopted daughter.

hangle: 보아하니 제가 피오나 영애에 대해 들은 소문은 전부 오해였나 봅니다?
first_translate: it seems the rumors I heard about lady fiona were all misunderstandings.
second_translate: It seems that all the rumors I heard about Lady Fiona were misunderstandings.

hangle: 제가 모르는 걸 보니 신경 쓸 가치가 없는 이야기인 게 분명하군요.
first_translate: since I don’t know about them, they must not be worth paying attention to.
second_translate: Since I'm unaware of them, they must not be worth paying attention to.

hangle: 고아하신 황후 폐하마저 그런 소문에 휘둘리고 계신 건 아니길 바랍니다.
first_translate: I hope even the graceful empress hasn’t been swayed by such rumors.
second_translate: I hope that even the esteemed Empress has not been influenced by such rumors.

hangle: 공작의 그 당당한 태도는 몇 년 동안 똑같군요.
first_translate: your confident attitude hasn’t changed over the years.
second_translate: The duke's confident attitude has remained the same for years.

hangle: 어떻게 나이를 먹어도 여전히 건방지니? 라는 말 아냐?
first_translate: are you saying, “how can you be so arrogant even as you age?”
second_translate: Are you saying, "How can you still be so arrogant even as you get older?"

hangle: 황후 폐하는 뵐 때마다 괄목하게 되는군요.
first_translate: I am always impressed whenever I see you, your majesty.
second_translate: I am always impressed whenever I see the Empress, Your Majesty.

hangle: 고귀한 분답게 세월의 흐름을 순순히 받아들이시는 모습이 보기 좋습니다.
first_translate: it’s nice to see you gracefully accepting the passage of time, as a noble person should.
second_translate: It's nice to see you embracing the passage of time with the grace befitting someone of your stature.
He's basically saying, "You've aged a lot."

hangle: 괜히 아벨이 중앙에서 지원을 못 받는 게 아니었어.
first_translate: no wonder abel doesn’t get support from the central government.
second_translate: No wonder Abel doesn't get any support from the central authorities.

first_translate: it’s rude to interrupt our conversation!
second_translate: It’s rude to interrupt a conversation!

hangle: 같이 시간을 보내는 걸 허락해 주겠나.
first_translate: would you allow me to spend some time with you?
second_translate: Would you allow me to spend some time with you?

first_translate: he’s trying to get me out of here.
second_translate: He's trying to leave me out.

first_translate: what do you think, my lady?
second_translate: What is your opinion, my lady?

first_translate: what is this? why do I feel like I’m being seduced?!
second_translate: What is this feeling? Am I being seduced?!

first_translate: I’m talking about your behavior earlier.
second_translate: I mean your behavior from earlier.
What kind of attitude are you talking about?

first_translate: it felt like you were trying to seduce me.
second_translate: It felt like you were trying to charm me.

hangle: 하지만 손등에 입을 맞추는 건 사교계에서는 늘 있는 일이고…
first_translate: but kissing the back of the hand is a common gesture in high society...
second_translate: But kissing the back of the hand is a common gesture in socialite circles...

hangle: 다른 놈들이 널 쳐다보고 있어서 일부러 그랬어.
first_translate: I did it on purpose because other guys were looking at you.
second_translate: I did it on purpose because other men were looking at you.

hangle: 이제야 내 태도가 좀 눈에 들어오나 봐?
first_translate: are you finally noticing my behavior?
second_translate: Are you finally starting to notice my behavior?

first_translate: you asked me to stay by your side and help you.
second_translate: You asked me to stay by your side and help last time.

hangle: 하지만 내 부탁이라면 다 들어줄 생각이야?
first_translate: but are you going to do everything I ask?
second_translate: But would you do anything I ask?

first_translate: if it’s something I can do.
second_translate: If it's something I can do.

first_translate: is his tie uncomfortable again? I’ll loosen it for him.
second_translate: Is his tie feeling tight again? I should loosen it for him.

first_translate: why are you trying to help me?
second_translate: Why are you willing to grant my request?

hangle: 정말 사람 헷갈리게 하는 데 일가견이 있어…
first_translate: you really have a knack for confusing people...
second_translate: You really have a knack for making people confused...
What do you mean by confusing?

hangle: 네가 자꾸 그러니 나도 마음대로 할 거야.
first_translate: since you keep doing that, I’ll do as I please too.
second_translate: Since you keep doing that, I'll do as I please too.

first_translate: I heard there’s going to be a big night market in town the day after tomorrow.
second_translate: I heard a big night market will be held in town the day after tomorrow.

first_translate: I want to go out with just the two of us.
second_translate: I want to go out with you alone.
